lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Why did Mary and Martha send word to Jesus?
answers: To let Him know that Lazarus was sick
To ask Him to teach a lesson
To ask him a tough question

questions.text: Jesus said, 'This sickness will not end in death. Because of it, God will receive...' what?
What did Jesus mean when He said, 'Lazarus has fallen asleep, but I will wake him up'?
answers: Lazarus had died, but Jesus would raise him from the dead

questions.text: How long did Jesus stay where He was before going to Lazarus' house?
When Martha met Jesus, what did she say to Him?
answers: If You had been here, my brother would not have died
Why did You wait so long?

questions.text: What did Jesus say would happen to anyone who believes in Him?
answers: They will live, even if they die

questions.text: After seeing the people crying at Lazarus' tomb, what did Jesus do?
What did Martha say when Jesus told them to open Lazarus' tomb?
answers: He has been dead for four days; there will be a smell

questions.text: What did Jesus say to Lazarus, and what happened?
answers: 'Lazarus, come out!' and Lazarus walked out of his tomb
'Can you hear us?' and nothing happened
'Be healed,' and he felt better inside the tomb
'Go home,' and Lazarus floated to heaven

questions.text: When they saw Lazarus come out, what did many of the people do?
